snippet: In “How to See,” David Salle aims to help the reader make sense of the sometimes perplexing world of contemporary art....
lead_paragraph: In “How to See,” David Salle aims to help the reader make sense of the sometimes perplexing world of contemporary art.

headline.main: An Artist’s Lesson on How to Appreciate Art
